1.name: John's Taxis
1.info: Covers all your transport needs from taxi car hire, people carrier, minibus, coach hire, courier, executive and wedding cars.

2.name: National Express
2.info: National Express is an intercity coach operator providing services throughout England, Scotland and Wales. It is a subsidiary of the National Express Group.

3.name: Southern Rail
3.info: Visit Southern to purchase anytime, anytime day, off-peak, Off-Peak day, super off-peak day, advance tickets and take advantage of the train ticket offers

4.name: Venice Rail
4.info: Visit Venice Rail to purchase anytime, anytime day, off-peak, Off-Peak day, super off-peak day, advance tickets and take advantage of the train ticket offers

5.name: Cali Rail
5.info: Visit Venice Rail to purchase anytime, anytime day, off-peak, Off-Peak day, super off-peak day, advance tickets and take advantage of the train ticket offers

6.name: Mario's Gondolas
6.info: The city of Venice sets official rates for gondola rides, which started at €80 for 40 minutes the last time we checked.

7.name: Venice Canal Bus Boats
7.info: For the visitor to Venice you have 2 options to get around, walk or by water. If you don't want to walk the water bus service is the affordable way to get around.

8.name: Europa Car
8.info: Book car hire from £13 a day. Choose from a range of comfortable and reliable hire cars and vans with Europcar.

9.name: Hertz
9.info: Book car hire and van hire across the UK and worldwide with Hertz. Our Best Rates Guarantee assures you receive the best rates when you book directly

10.name: Enterprise
10.info: Book car hire and van hire across the UK and worldwide with Hertz. Our Best Rates Guarantee assures you receive the best rates when you book directly

11.name: Aqua Cars
11.info: Portsmouth's largest taxi and private car hire company. Aqua Cars the Driving Force in Portsmouth.

12.name: Andicars
12.info: The largest Minicab, corporate & Airport Transfer firm in Havant and Waterlooville area, also serving Portsmouth. Up to 40% cheaper than a hackney Taxi.

13.name: First Group Buses
13.info: We have bus routes serving 40 of the UK's largest towns and cities providing great value public transport for students, commuters
